about_the_game:
Get ready to create your very own flying cafe in the clouds! Build and decorate your cafe, hire and train staff, tackle various surprising random events, design menus, and explore new flight routes. Unveil the secrets behind this aerial commercial empire and experience the fascinating journey from a small cafe owner to a business tycoon.




Design your cafe according to your preferences! From the counter, tables, and chairs, to doors, windows, equipment, and every brick in the walls, your design choices will not only affect customer satisfaction but also enhance the overall appeal of your cafe.




Meet employees and customers with unique appearances and personalities. Whether it’s the barista, waiter, researcher, or manager, it’s up to you to arrange them. Each employee has their own talents and unique skills. Skillfully combine these skills to create powerful combos, adding more variables and fun to your management strategy.




Through the research lab, create various unique coffee and baked products. Each product’s development requires players to deeply explore ingredient combinations and flavors to create novel items that satisfy customers' taste buds.




The entropy system represents the level of chaos and order in your cafe. Entropy sources include buildings, customers, random events, and everything else in the game world. By optimizing service processes, arranging layouts wisely, and handling events promptly, you can control the growth of entropy and maintain efficient cafe operations. Will you keep your cafe orderly and customers satisfied, or take risks for higher profits and face more chaos? It all depends on your management skills!




Strategy cards are your secret weapon to influence the game! They can increase sales, reduce entropy, quickly handle events, enhance employee abilities, and more. Each card has its unique timing and effect. Ready to show off your cards?




Move around the map and you might encounter unique characters. You can recruit them to join your team and unlock new game content and storylines. Get ready to embark on this exciting journey with these unique companions!




Oh, and don’t forget to participate in the culinary contests and employee team competitions hosted by the Coffee Gourmet Alliance. These competitions are not only a stage to test your cafe’s service level and product innovation but also an excellent opportunity to boost your reputation and attract more customers.
